description:
My place is on Lexington Ave. and just steps away for the 6 train, which connects you to other train lines and 3 avenues away from Central Park! Easy to hail a yellow cab! Great restaurants nearby; such as, El Paso Taqueria, Moustache Pitza, Lexington Pizza Parlour, La Shuk French Moroccan, Burritos Y Mas,The Lexington Social, Pro Thai, Joy Burger. You’ll enjoy the location for the accessibility and the ambience. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.

Cozy, airy and clean apartment. Long entry hallway into the apartment. Bathroom is away from the room. We recommend shoes off during your stay; however, it is not mandatory.

Walking distance to Central Park. Restaurants and markets nearby.

Steps away from the 6 line train, which connects you to other train lines so that you can get around in Manhattan, Brooklyn, Queens, Bronx, Staten Island and to New Jersey.

Only one main entrance. No lift in the building. 4th floor walkup to the apartment
name: NYC Cozy Studio
